mapper.select: SELECT video.id, video.video_url, video_record.current_minute FROM video_record LEFT JOIN video ON video_id = video.id WHERE customer_id = #{record.customer.id} AND video_id = #{record.video.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video_record ( customer_id, video_id, current_minute ) VALUES (#{record.customer.id},#{record.video.id},#{record.currentMinute});
